refreshPaddingMs

ServiceCacheBuilder<T> refreshPaddingMs(int refreshPaddingMs)
To avoid herding in noisy scenarios, the cache should be padded to only update 1 per period. The refresh padding is that period in milliseconds. Set to 0 to turn off padding.

Parameters:
refreshPaddingMs - padding in milliseconds
Returns:
this
